articles.title: Olympic medal count: Japan retakes lead in gold race - Nikkei Asia

articles.content: TOKYO -- The Tokyo Olympics started last week and the competition for gold medals is hot, especially between Japan, China and the U.S. In Wednesday's events, Yui Ohashi of Japan won the gold medal in… [+579 chars]

articles.title: China's Sinopharm Covid-19 vaccine could soon be made available in Singapore - AsiaOne
articles.description: SINGAPORE - The Sinopharm vaccine could soon be made available in Singapore, with several private healthcare groups already taking steps to secure doses of the jab. This will likely see it becoming the fourth vaccine available in the country, as it ramps up n…

articles.title: K-drama's rising idol Jang Ki-yong enlisting into military service in August - AsiaOne
articles.description: Looks like we have to bid farewell to Korean leading man Jang Ki-yong for the next two years. Yesterday (July 26), it was announced that the rising K-drama star is scheduled to enlist into the military next month. The 28-year-old's talent management agency YG…
